NEW STORY ARC Does the Nailbiter know why sixteen of the worldâ€™s worst serial killers all came from the same small town? Does he know the truth? Find out as the Nailbiter...confesses!
The Buckaroo Butchers Year Book* At the end of this issue is a gallery of the Buckaroo Butchers (that may or may not be complete):
Book Burner Grave Digger Crossbones Killer Good Samaritan Lucha Eliminador Clown Car Killer The Whistler Y2K Killer Mister Fatal Terrible Two The Lucky 13 Assassin The Silent Movie Killer The Blonde WTF Killer The Hatewatcher Nailbiter The Butcher of Buckaroo ? (Who's next?)
